statements: DELETE FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_topic = 'Safety Training' AND training_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_duration_hours > 10 AND training_topic = 'Technical Support';
DELETE FROM training_records WHERE training_type = 'Onboarding' AND duration_hours > 5;
DELETE FROM employees WHERE id = 101 AND department = 'Engineering';
DELETE FROM training_records WHERE duration_hours > 10 AND training_type = 'Safety' AND training_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM training_completion WHERE completion_date = '2022-01-15' AND score < 80;
DELETE FROM department_training_records WHERE department_name = 'HR' AND training_completed = true;
DELETE FROM employee_department WHERE department_name = 'HR' AND employee_position = 'Manager';
DELETE FROM Trainers WHERE specialty = 'SQL' AND trainer_id IN (SELECT trainer_id FROM Trainers WHERE trainer_name = 'John Doe');
